Line17.FA865: He emerged armed with sacred conviction! A holy battle at the center of the prophecy, to be won by his blade. He has meditated here for years and years ever since, readying to meet fate head-on.
Line15.FA865: It pains me to withhold the truth of his Light! But I sense it in you, pilgrim. So I shall tell you. He went to speak with the first of his children, Rathma. The prophecy’s true author.
